long_description: The Thule Crossover daypack is a highly functional daypack with crushproof SafeZone(TM) compartment that withstands the abuse of your everyday adventures. Padded, integrated laptop compartment holds up to a 17 in. MacBook Pro or PC. Heat-molded, crushproof SafeZone top compartment protects your sunglasses, iPhone(R), portable electronics and other fragile gear. Die-cut EVA shoulder straps with mesh covering provide ventilation and breathability. Compression straps customize the bag to the size of your load. Organization compartment keeps cords and other accessories at hand but out of the way. Multiple grab-and-go handles allow easy transport of the Thule Crossover daypack. Side pockets keep water bottle or other small accessories close at hand. Lightweight, durable fabric is also water-resistant.
short_description: The Thule Crossover daypack is a highly functional daypack with crushproof SafeZone(TM) compartment that withstands the abuse of your everyday adventures.
